    D

    DocumentControllerTests - Class in kp.resource.server.b.controllers
    Tests for the Document Controller, verifying access control to document endpoints based on user roles and authentication.
    DocumentControllerTests() - Constructor for class kp.resource.server.b.controllers.DocumentControllerTests
     

    K

    kp.resource.server.b.controllers - package kp.resource.server.b.controllers
     

    S

    shouldGetDocument(String, String) - Method in class kp.resource.server.b.controllers.DocumentControllerTests
    Verifies that an authorized user with the specified role can access the document endpoint and receive the expected response.
    shouldNotGetDocumentWhenIncorrectRoleProvided(String, String) - Method in class kp.resource.server.b.controllers.DocumentControllerTests
    Verifies that an authorized user with an incorrect role is forbidden from accessing the document endpoint and receives an HTTP 403 Forbidden status.
    shouldNotGetDocumentWhenNoRoleProvided(String) - Method in class kp.resource.server.b.controllers.DocumentControllerTests
    Verifies that an unauthorized user without any role is forbidden from accessing the document endpoint and receives an HTTP 403 Forbidden status.
